overview: Alex's life is quite simple and predictable. From day to day he teaches children to swim. You don't pay much for a coach's salary, so he doesn't have much joy. But once a guy falls in love with a fabulously beautiful star. It is not so easy to conquer a beauty. And it will take a lot of money. So Alex decides to rob a bank. So he will get the money and impress the girl. But we should not forget that money is not the main thing when it comes to true love.
title: Пограбування по-українськи
